person.persName: Jeremiah Pierson (Morgan County, Illinois, marble merchant and justice of the peace.)

body.p: Morgan County, Illinois, marble merchant and justice of the peace. New Jersey native. Married to Sarah E. Catlin Pierson in Hancock County, Illinois, on February 23, 1847. Father of Addie Pierson, Emma Pierson, Maria Pierson, Daniel Pierson, Azel Pierson, Mary Pierson, and James Pierson. Blacksmith in Morgan County, Illinois, in 1850. Marble merchant in Morgan County in 1860. Justice of the peace in Morgan County in 1864.
